text: Charles Clarence Beck (June 8, 1910 â€“ November 22, 1989) was an American cartoonist and comic book artist, best known for his work on Captain Marvel (today known as Shazam!) at Fawcett Comics and DC Comics. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1989 deaths Category:American cartoonists Category:Fawcett Comics Category:DC Comics
